Title: Farewell to Storyville
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michael Narducci, L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), Marguerite MacIntyre (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Claire Holt, Phoebe Tonkin
Plot: Since the original vampires were stuck in the cemetery, Klaus takes any chances to punish his sister with the Original-killer stake.
